column1: Why does everyone insist on putting up Christmas trees so early? Bah humbug!
It's beginning to look like a lot like Christmas!
You won't catch me putting up a Christmas tree yet
Do me a favour, get rid of that Christmas jumper
It's all Christmas, all the time. When will it end?
Very excited about seeing Santa later today!
Can't wait to put up the Christmas tree!
Spreading Christmas joy with the gift of giving
I think I'm allergic to tinsel
The only good thing about Christmas is pigs in blankets
Christmas officially starts now
I love mince pies
It's way too early for Christmas decorations
Making Christmas wishes and celebrating with friends
All set for the Christmas jumper contest at work!
Singing along to Christmas music and decorating the tree. My favourite time of year
If one more person complains about the lack of mince pies, I'm going to ban Christmas
I'm counting down to the end of this Christmas nonsense
Sending Christmas cards and getting in to the festive spirit
I'm already sick of the Christmas carols
Only twenty sleeps until Christmas!
Anyone else fed up with Christmas music already?
